review_data.title: Mr. Mac
review_data.content: We had checked in to a nearby hotel and were looking for a something quick to eat before going out to sightsee for the rest of the afternoon. The food was not great, but certainly okay, and my young granddaughter was happy about getting a...More

review_data.title: Do NOT buy late at night
review_data.content: Do NOT order burgers from this McDonalds late at night. They prepare burgers long before, and by the time you get them, they’re dry and stale. The McDonalds at Stadelhofen is way better.

review_data.title: McDonald’s
review_data.content: I’ve been McDonald’s before believe it or not but this is so so much better plus fresh produce and nice friendly staff language barrier but troublesome at times but translator app is ideal

review_data.title: Good for a breakfast when in need
review_data.content: I have had breakfast here a few times but only when in need. It is not bad but a bit pricey for a breakfast and if you want an orange juice that is extra. As usual it is just average and only when in need

review_data.title: Rude staff
review_data.content: Rude and sarcastic staff. Generally unhelpful and treat tourists like a problem. Overcrowded and utterly cramped. Standard of food is average

review_data.title: October business trip

review_data.title: mcdonald
review_data.content: Standart Mcdonald place with the regular big mac. Go only if you must. Big place with nice view to Bahnhofstrasse.

review_data.title: Essen gut, Sauberkeit mangelhaft

review_data.title: Usual Mc Donald's with an advantage: open until very very late
review_data.content: This is a typical Mc Donald's. I appreciated it a lot when, after a night in Zurich, before getting the night train home, I could still get an hamburger very late in the night. Sorry: very early in the morning!

review_data.title: mc ds
review_data.content: Always try MC D'S every country i go to to see what different food they have to offer compared to the UK. I weren't disappointed they offered a lot more options then UK so was impressed and full up after the meal.

review_data.title: Regulal McDonalds
review_data.content: This is a regular McDonalds, but it is more consistent in food quality found in most McDonalds around the world. But the McDonalds in Lugano, Switzerland is like eating in museum, in a very old and beautiful palace.

review_data.title: A typical McDs
review_data.content: I picked up 6 McNuggets for 6 CHF for a quick snack and it's nice to see that McD's is still relatively economical - even in Zurich. This location was clean and the staff were pleasant.

review_data.title: Surprisingly OK

review_data.title: Nice breakfast - unfriendly service
review_data.content: Typical McDo breakfast, a good value in Zurich if you do not know the city well. Unfortunately, no one seems to have trained the staff to be friendly and smily. You do not really feel welcomed there.

review_data.title: Closest Macca to the Bahnhof
